name: GMTK jam 2022 game - Wizard Oldjoe
description:
Controls:

Move: W,A,S,D
Dash: Space
Shoot gun: Left Mouse Button
Summon ally: Right Mouse Button

Description:

How the game is played is as follows: In the game, the player must move his character around the screen and shoot enemies. Enemies drop health points (HPs) and items which the player can use to his advantage. The player can also use different abilities and ammo to defeat enemies. The game features a high score table which the player can aim to improve.

Authors:

Marko Gorenak - the game
Luka Balažic - web page and moral support
